query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'blog_posts' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user QFvPm5Jiq2VbcdU.33b2dcb6631d --database bJpZLaNUAwiEuNvz3b7LGz --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'blog_posts' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
title	varchar
slug	varchar
excerpt	text
content	text
coverImageUrl	text
coverImageKey	text
seoTitle	varchar
seoDescription	text
seoKeywords	text
contentType	enum
status	enum
categoryId	int
tags	text
authorId	int

readingTimeMin	int
viewCount	int
